entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy. Low minus 5.
